p:
SNPs associated with altered gene expression (i.e. eQTLs) were identified using genome-wide genotype and gene expression data in all available FHS samples (n = 5257) at FDR<0.1 (Joehanes R, submitted, 2014, and a brief summary of methods and results are provided in the
S2 Text ). A cis-eQTL was defined as an eQTL within 1 megabase (MB) flanking the gene. Other eQTLs were defined as trans-eQTLs. We combined the eQTL list generated in the FHS with the eQTLs generated by meta-analysis of seven other studies (n = 5300) that were also based on whole blood expression[ 12].
